More than ever, todayâ€™s Western society remains profoundly divided. Whether it's identitarian splinters, growing political animosities, or challenges to individual freedoms, perhaps the greatest source of the crisis in our contemporary democracies comes from within society.

To discuss those topics we invited Jordan Peterson to Room for Discussion. Professor Peterson is a clinical psychologist who has gained notoriety due to his influential but also controversial analyses from current social and political problems.
